entry.title: The Four Musketeers
entry.content: 🎥 The Four Musketeers, 1974 ⭐️ ★★★½ The intrigues deepen, the affairs of the heart take center stage, and the tone shifts slightly toward something more mature, more cunning. The cast is still perfectly in tune, and while the sword fights remain a bit scrappy, they carry that same Lester flair. Michel Legrand’s score is probably one of his laziest efforts, sadly. 🔗 https://letterboxd.com/julienpierre/film/the-four-musketeers/ #FilmReview
